participant_2.background:
I'm going to a horror movie marathon with my friends to support a local charity.
I love the sweet and juicy flavor of watermelon.
I am a dentist who has a soft spot for my parents and sweets.
I am an introvert night owl studying radiology in my 20s.
i do not like the beach.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Hi! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm excited to go to a horror movie marathon with my friends tonight.
Sounds fun! I love horror movies. What's your favorite horror movie?
I'm a big fan of the Saw series. I also really like The Conjuring and The Blair Witch Project.
I love those movies too! I'm a big horror movie fan in general.
Me too! I love the adrenaline rush that I get from being scared.
Me too! It's so much fun to be scared with a group of people.
Exactly! It's even better when you're with friends who are just as scared as you are.
What are you going to do after the movie marathon?
We're going to go out for pizza and then probably play some video games.
That sounds like a fun night! I hope you have a great time!
